label_reply_directly_when_qa_matched: Reply directly when QA knowledge is matched
tooltip_library_mode_qa_direct_reply: In library-only mode, when the highest-scoring retrieved segment is in QA format and exceeds the specified threshold, reply directly with the segment's answer without LLM generation.
tooltip_mixture_mode_qa_direct_reply: In mixture mode, when the highest-scoring retrieved segment is in QA format and exceeds the specified threshold, reply directly with the segment's answer without LLM generation.
desc_library_mode: When users ask questions, retrieve documents from the knowledge base. The LLM responds based on retrieved segments. If no matching segments are found, no LLM reply is generated; instead, an unknown question prompt is returned.
desc_mixture_mode: When users ask questions, retrieve documents from the knowledge base. The LLM responds based on retrieved segments. If no matching segments are found, the LLM generates a response independently.
desc_direct_mode: When users ask questions, the LLM generates answers directly without retrieving from associated knowledge bases.
